name: fitspark
description: FitSpark - AI-powered fitness tracking and coaching platform

scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm run build:staging && firebase use fitspark-staging && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:production: pnpm run build:production && firebase use fitspark-production && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:hosting: pnpm run build:production --filter=@fitspark/web && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:hosting:staging: pnpm run build:staging --filter=@fitspark/web && firebase use fitspark-staging && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:hosting:production: pnpm run build:production --filter=@fitspark/web && firebase use fitspark-production && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: cd functions && npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:staging: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use fitspark-staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:production: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use fitspark-production && firebase deploy --only functions
